body: after champion select i can't join the game and when i try to reconect i can't reconect any solu tions

replies.body: It sounds like your connection is failing to transition you from champion select to the game server, which are two separate services.  Go over each instruction in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network and remove any blocks while reaching the game server.  Let me know if you have any questions!
